How to Acquire Surprised

Initiating combat on an unaware enemy with an attack from a hidden party member.

How to Remove Surprised

This condition is removed at the end of your next turn.

Surprised Notes & Tips

Moving the entire party in Stealth up close to the enemy and then attack with each from Stealth can give the entire party a Surprise round where the enemy can't react at all. More notes and tips go here.
